name: Nebula .IO - Gar Planets Battle
description:
Play ONLINE with Thousands of other REAL players, in this FAST-PACED real-time multiplayer game! This game is easy to pick up, with great online gameplay and stunning live-rendered graphics. You'll find it hard to put down!
////////////////////////////////
Name your Blob, use cool SKINS, and CHAT with other real online players. Make teams with other players, and sometimes betray them (MUAHAHAH). REALLY fun! Seriously, don't even trust us, try it!

YOU WON'T WANT TO PUT IT DOWN- It's really addictive!
With beautiful graphics, fun sounds, and great controls, we highly recommend that you give this game a try!


Other Credits: Planet icons: vecteezy (www.vecteezy.com)
